1.question: What if the AI gives wrong information?
1.answer: The HR Agent can only answer from your approved documents. Every answer includes source citations so employees can verify. If information isn't in your knowledge base, it says "I don't know" instead of guessing.

2.question: How long does implementation take?
2.answer: Most customers are live within 2-4 weeks. We handle the document processing and training. Your team just needs to provide access to your HR documents.

3.question: Is our employee data safe?
3.answer: Your data never leaves EU datacenters. We don't train AI models on your data. Full GDPR compliance with DPA included. We can provide security documentation for your IT team.

4.question: Will this replace our HR team?
4.answer: No. The HR Agent handles routine questions so your HR professionals can focus on strategic work: culture, development, employee relations. It's augmentation, not replacement.

5.question: What about complex or sensitive questions?
5.answer: The system recognizes when questions need human attention and routes them to your HR team. It handles the routine 50-70%, your team handles the rest.
